mapper.insert: insert into teacher ( teacher_num, userid, username, teacher_profileImagePath, highschool, university, spec1, spec1_img, spec1_getDate ) values ( (select nvl(max(teacher_num)+1,1) from teacher), #{userid}, #{username}, #{teacher_profileImagePath}, #{highschool}, #{university}, #{spec1}, #{spec1_img}, #{spec1_getDate} )
mapper.update: update kdemymember set teacher='w' where userid=#{userid}
